name: Sir, Dont Show Off
author: 缘漫动漫-缘娘
content: Lin Xiu, a playboy, was reborn in the body of someone in a different world. He could copy others&#039 abilities when he touched them? That&#039s cool! His road to intimate interactions with others started there... &quotWait! My sister-in-law, don&#039t beat me! I didn&#039t flirt with other girls. I was doing something serious!&quot
